title: New release by Typefolio: Adriane Swash
content:
Hello!

We have just released a new typeface, Adriane Swash. A new version of the award winning Adriane Text. Visit the project here: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefolio/adriane-swash/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414174415/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefolio/adriane-swash/)

- Kind regards,

Marconi Lima | Typefolio Digital Foundry
author: marconi_lima

comments.content: Nice work, Marconi! Swashes Are Elegant, especially the [Q]!
